name: Kiss the Cock Apron
description:
Finally! The perfect gift for the Sriracha fiend in your life. 

<font color=red>Each Screen Printed Chili Pepper Red</font> Bib Apron features Adjustable Tunnel Style Pull Thru Neck and Ties making this a true One Size Fits All.

65% polyester/35% cotton twill fabric. Features two 8" Pockets for easy access to a bottle of rooster sauce while cooking. 

Available in One Size Fits All to fit the little and giant roosters in your home!

Size 20"W x 30"L 

Great for guys and gals!

Shipping Details:
All FYS packages are shipped via USPS. Shipping rates include flat rate for Priority Mail with Delivery Confirmation.
